The Tri-State division of The Melee Games began September 13, 2014 with 30 teams participating. The finals took place at [[Super Nebulous]] on November 30, and the winner of the division will play against the winner of the [[The Melee Games Season 2/New_England|New England]] division at [[Apex 2015]] for the grand finals of Season 2.
